nodes.label: Identify Contract Type
nodes.question: What type of agreement is this (NDA, SaaS, employment, service)?

nodes.label: Verify Parties & Authority
nodes.question: Are all parties clearly identified? Do signatories have authority to bind?

nodes.label: Determine Governing Law
nodes.question: Which jurisdiction's law governs? Is there a choice-of-law clause?

nodes.label: Analyze Key Terms
nodes.question: Review core obligations, consideration, scope, and duration.

nodes.label: Identify High-Risk Clauses
nodes.question: Check indemnification, limitation of liability, termination, non-compete, IP assignment.

nodes.label: Review Confidentiality Provisions
nodes.question: What information is covered? Duration of obligations? Exceptions?

nodes.label: Assess Remedies & Dispute Resolution
nodes.question: What remedies are available? Arbitration vs litigation? Venue?

nodes.label: Check Regulatory Compliance
nodes.question: Does the agreement comply with applicable laws (data protection, competition)?

nodes.label: Issues Identified ⚠️ — Legal Review Needed
nodes.question: Flag problematic clauses for attorney review.
